name: Swap-over mazes
description:
Pair-wise logic-mazes where two pawns must swap locations by following paths of matching colour. You control one pawn only.

  • Number of puzzles: 4
  • Average play time: 30 mins 
  • First published: June 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Hackable version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=a8911eb6f2f9e6f051a5f1be182c80ca

For more clickmazes puzzles visit: http://www.clickmazes.com/index.htm
